response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly enhance your endeavors and contribute significantly to your success. Given its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value of $1,500,000, making it an attractive proposition for someone as discerning as yourself. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further if you're interested. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1200000}
